mapper.select: select * from completionquestion,user,completionquestionlabel,questionlabel,completionquestionanswer where completionquestion.completionQuestionId=completionquestionlabel.completionQuestionId and completionquestion.userId=user.userId and completionquestionlabel.questionLabelId=questionlabel.questionLabelId and completionquestion.completionQuestionId=completionquestionanswer.completionQuestionId and (completionquestion.isPrivate=0 or (completionquestion.isPrivate=1 and completionquestion.userId=#{userId})) order by completionquestion.completionQuestionId

select * from completionquestion,user,completionquestionlabel,questionlabel,completionquestionanswer where completionquestion.completionQuestionId=completionquestionlabel.completionQuestionId and completionquestion.userId=user.userId and completionquestionlabel.questionLabelId=questionlabel.questionLabelId and completionquestion.completionQuestionId=completionquestionanswer.completionQuestionId and completionquestion.completionQuestionId=#{completionQuestionId} order by completionquestion.completionQuestionId

select choiceQuestionId from examquestion,completionquestion where examquestion.examId=#{examId} and examquestion.examQuestionId=completionquestion.completionQuestionId and examquestion.examQuestionType='completionQuestion'

select questionId from examquestion,exam where examquestion.examQuestionType='completionQuestion' and examquestion.questionId=#{completionQuestionId} and examquestion.examId=exam.examId and exam.examStatus='Running'
